msg_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to move this image to 'no_used' folder?
msg_batch_delete_info: Will filter tags/sentences based on blacklist/whitelist settings.
setting_batch_trigger: Add Folder Name as Trigger Word
setting_mask_delete_npz: Delete npz when moving old images
setting_filter_info: Tags matching blacklist but not whitelist will be highlighted red, and can be deleted during batch write.
setting_mask_ocr_hint: OCR requires imgutils. Skipped if not installed.
setting_ocr_heat_tip: Lower detects blurry text but more false positives; Higher detects only clear text.
setting_ocr_box_tip: Filter low confidence text boxes. Lower if missing text.
setting_ocr_unclip_tip: Expand text box ratio. Increase if missing start/end chars; Decrease if overlapping lines.
msg_confirm_prompt_tags:
Prompt contains {tags} but no tags data available.
Continue?
msg_ocr_disabled: OCR detection is disabled in settings.
msg_restore_no_backup:
No backup found for original image
(Maybe no unmask/mask text performed yet)
tip_unmask: Auto remove background using AI. Original saved to unmask folder.
tip_mask_text: Auto detect and mask text areas using OCR.
tip_restore: Restore original image from unmask folder, overwriting current.
tip_batch_unmask: Batch unmask all images. Check settings for filters.
tip_batch_mask_text: Batch OCR mask text for all images.
tip_batch_restore: Batch restore all images from unmask folder.
tip_stroke_eraser: Manually erase areas with mouse brush. Good for fine-tuning.
msg_cuda_warning_content:
NVIDIA GPU (CUDA) not detected.

This may be due to incorrect PyTorch version in venv.
Please run 'fix_torch_gpu.bat' in root directory to fix.

Running on CPU, will be very slow.
tip_llm_dim:
Max image dimension for LLM.
Larger: More detail but higher cost/slower
Smaller: Faster/Cheaper but may miss details
tip_llm_skip_nsfw: Check to skip images with explicit/questionable rating in Batch LLM
tip_llm_gray_mask:
Check to fill transparent areas with gray for LLM,
helping AI focus on subject instead of background
tip_tagger_model: WD14 Tagger Model. Common: EVA02_Large (Accurate), SwinV2 (Fast)
tip_tagger_gen_thresh:
General Tags Threshold (0.0~1.0)
Lower: More tags, more errors
Higher: Precise, fewer tags
tip_tagger_mcut: Enable MCut algorithm for auto threshold, overriding manual setting
tip_tagger_char_thresh:
Character Tags Threshold (0.0~1.0)
Recommend high (0.8+) to avoid false positives
tip_tagger_drop_overlap: Remove overlapping tags (e.g. keep 'long hair', drop 'hair')
tip_text_lower:
Force all English tags/sentences to lowercase,
common format for Stable Diffusion training
tip_text_empty: Auto remove empty lines in text files
tip_text_format: Auto format tags: remove extra spaces, use ', ' separator
tip_text_save: Auto save to .txt file when editing
tip_batch_mode: How to write to .txt files during batch
tip_batch_overwrite: Overwrite existing content completely (Use with caution)
tip_batch_trigger:
Add folder name as trigger word at start of sentence
e.g. folder '1girl_miku' adds 'miku'
tip_mask_alpha:
Residual Alpha Removal (1-254)
Lower: Cleaner (Transparent)
Higher: More semi-transparent details
tip_mask_padding:
Shrink mask edge inwards (pixels)
Larger: Cleaner edge but may clip subject
Smaller: Keep edge details
tip_mask_blur:
Edge blur radius (Gaussian)
Larger: Softer edge
Smaller: Sharp edge
tip_mask_bg_only:
Batch Unmask only processes images with 'background' tag
Avoids processing images that don't need unmasking
tip_mask_ocr: Enable OCR to auto detect and mask text areas
tip_mask_text_alpha:
Alpha for Text Masking only (Default 10)
Lower: More transparent/cleaner masking
tip_mask_del_npz: Auto delete .npz cache when moving original image
tip_mask_reverse: Reverse subject and background (Remove subject, keep background)
label_mask_only_map: Output B&W Mask Only (No Original Change)
tip_mask_only_map: Do not change original image file. Display uses mask/ B&W map for preview.
tip_batch_ratio: Apply unmask only if foreground ratio is within range
tip_min_ratio: Skip if subject is too small (below this ratio)
tip_max_ratio: Skip if subject fills screen (above this ratio)
tip_skip_scenery: Skip unmask if tags contain indoors or outdoors
tip_bl_words:
Tags containing keywords will be marked as Character Tags (Red).
Can be auto deleted in Batch Write.
tip_bl_words_detail:
e.g. hair, eyes, skin (General appearance)
Filter these for LoRA training.
tip_wl_words: Tags containing keywords will NOT be marked even if matching blacklist.
tip_wl_words_detail:
e.g. holding hair, background (Action/Context)
Keep these as they are not inherent character traits.
tip_filter_input:
Danbooru syntax filter, press Enter
e.g. blonde_hair blue_eyes (AND)
-rating:explicit (No NSFW)
order:landscape
tip_view_mode:
Switch Preview Mode
- Original
- RGB: Force Opaque
- Alpha: Transparency Mask

Shortcut: Hold N (RGB) / M (Alpha)
tip_auto_tag:
Auto tag current image using WD14 AI.
Click labels to add to text box.
tip_batch_tagger:
Batch tag all images in folder
Saves to JSON, not txt.
tip_batch_tagger_txt:
Batch tag all images and write to .txt
Uses cached tags if available.
tip_add_custom_tag: Add custom tag to current folder's list (stored in .custom_tags.json)
tip_run_llm:
Generate natural language description using AI LLM.
Result shown in LLM Result box.
tip_batch_llm:
Batch LLM generation for all images
Saves to JSON, not txt.
tip_batch_llm_txt:
Batch LLM generation and write to .txt
Uses cache if available.
tip_prev_nl:
View previous LLM result.
History kept for each image.
tip_token_count:
CLIP Token Count. SD limit ~225.
Red if exceeded.
tip_find_replace: Find and Replace text in current or all images (Regex supported)
msg_restore_sidecar_tagger: Restored {count} Tagger results from sidecar to txt
msg_prompt_char_name_warn:
Prompt contains unreplaced '{角色名}'.
This may cause incorrect results.
Please enter character name manually or adjust prompt.

Continue?
msg_restore_sidecar_llm: Restored {count} LLM results from sidecar to txt
msg_batch_restore_confirm:
Are you sure you want to restore all images to original (if exists)?
This will overwrite/delete the current unmasked version.
tip_no_worker: No worker available for this task (check settings or install dependencies).
